Capital One: including Nottingham and London (UK). ONSITE, but with opportunities to work from home available.

Capital One are hiring Java Software Engineers, Front-end software engineers and Quality Assurance Engineers (And probably more roles which I don't know of). We work with AWS and have some pretty big projects on at the moment. It's a great place to work, often winning awards for treating employees well. You can view the available jobs and apply here https://rolp.co/vlOEc

(Note that if you don't know exactly which job is right for you, you can apply anyway and they will try to match you).
